review: I waited until they added HBO Go to get this.  I wish I hadn't waited!  I LOVE this.  I tried the Google Chromecast first and it was a nightmare to use.  In comparison, the Fire Stick is a breeze!
author: vacation4mom

review: Great stick for the price but would be nice if wireless casting of video through miracast was higher definition and that it worked universally with websites.  I am still debating between thus or chromecast as this isnt universal.
author: Brett S. Lorenzen

review: I love it! I use it on the tv we watch mostand we watch great movies etc. We love it and are saving tons of money.
author: Debbe Noonan

review: In addition to Amazon Prime, I'm using my Fire Stick for Netflix and Hulu Plus - one really great thing about it is that it travels so well.  I do a lot of business travel, and the Fire Stick plugs into the TVs in most hotel rooms and works seamlessly on the Hotel internet!
author: Russ Lowenthal

review: Outstanding, better then expected and now with the new update even better !!!

review: Honestly... this is performing at a higher level then I ever thought. Terrific product. Actually... my only problem was getting into the remote to put in the batteries. Sneaky and totally not user friendly. But since I succeeded eventually, I should stop grousing... at least till I have to replace the batteries.
